ValidationRule.description: If a lead Status has been set to Unqualified, then the Reason Unqualified field must be filed out. BODEV-2539: Approach updated so that it only triggers when Status is changed to Unqualified, not on later edits on other fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), TEXT( Status ) = "Unqualified", ISCHANGED(Status), NOT(ISNEW()), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Unqualified__c, "") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete the Reason Unqualified field.
